summary:
•	Industry scientist with extensive experience in biological drug development, hands on experience from early R&D, preclinical to clinical stage, familiar with cGLP, cGMP and regulatory requirements.
 
•	Specialties: protein/Ab drug & antibody drug conjugate (ADC) development, including upstream cell culture (E. coli, S2 insect cells, mammalian cells-CHO/HEK), and downstream process development (purification, refolding, characterization, formulation, stability study, and quality control assays, etc.); study protein-protein interaction by SPR and ITC; study protein structure and function by X-ray crystallography.

•	Very hardworking and productive PhD scientist with a unique ability to manage team-based research projects, in addition to training and mentoring fellow associates.

•	Thorough and well-spoken leader who has communicated data and project plans to all levels of professionals both internally and in a conference setting.
headline: Director at InduPro

ingestedContentSummary.description: The Opportunity We are seeking an enthusiastic and highly motivated conjugation scientist to join InduPro Protein Sciences group to help expedite and enable our therapeutic opportunities via induced proximity strategies. As part of an exciting...
ingestedContentSummary.fullText: InduPro, Inc. is bringing life-changing therapies to patients through novel cell-surface platform technologies. We are defining and manipulating protein interactions beyond natural signaling paradigms. InduPro platforms integrate inherent protein proximity at the cell surface with the ability to manipulate protein pairings via induced protein proximity to create novel signaling pathways and logic gates. Our culture fosters innovation at every level. We are seeking an enthusiastic and highly motivated conjugation scientist to join InduPro Protein Sciences group to help expedite and enable our therapeutic opportunities via induced proximity strategies. As part of an exciting startup, you will support Antibody Drug Conjugate (ADC)/protein production and characterization efforts and execute on strategic workplans to advance drug candidates from discovery into IND filing. You will also work cross-functionally with other teams in a dynamic and collaborative environment.
ingestedContentSummary.title: InduPro Therapeutics - Scientist II, Protein Sciences

message.text:
We're hiring! We're embarking on exciting discoveries at InduPro and need your expertise to propel them toward becoming life-saving therapies! We're seeking an experienced conjugation scientist to join our Protein Sciences team. If you're interested, check out the details!

https://lnkd.in/gKfGZeKy

commentary.text: You are already missed here, Mike. Best of luck on your next journey!
Congrats Brenda, so proud of you!
